Name: Print Deck
Description: See the progress of your 3d prints via Octoprint on your stream deck

com.johnnymast.printdeck.octoprint_progr.Tooltip: Show the OctoPrint progression on your Stream Deck

com.johnnymast.printdeck.octoprint_opena.Name: Open OctoPrint page
com.johnnymast.printdeck.octoprint_opena.Tooltip: Open your OctoPrint page in your web browser.

com.johnnymast.printdeck.octoprint_set_t.Name: Set temperature
com.johnnymast.printdeck.octoprint_set_t.Tooltip: Set the temperature for your printer.
